data.message: Received DURO Design OS architecture from user: User elevated Abstract-to-Digital framework into complete operating system: 3 layers (Intent → Composition → Behavior), 10-point runbook, 6-point scorecard. Critical correction: color-emotion is heuristic not law (perceptual mechanics ARE constants). This transforms taste into trainable methodology.
